sceneDescription.title: Billy Bones Watches the Coastal Road

setting.location: Cliff overlook near Admiral Benbow Inn, Devon coast
setting.weather: Clear day with strong sea breeze

characters.appearance: Grizzled sea captain, 50s, alert posture, hand shading eyes
characters.clothing: Blue coat flapping in wind, tricorn hat, brass telescope at side
characters.action: Scanning the coastal road intently with telescope

scene.mainElements: Dramatic clifftop position overlooking both the winding coastal road below and vast ocean, captain maintaining vigilant watch like a sentry
scene.details: Telescope glinting in sunlight, coat tails whipping in wind, worn path along cliff edge from repeated pacing, scattered wildflowers and sea grass bending in breeze, distant merchant wagons on road appearing tiny from height
scene.background: Expansive view of Devon coastline, white-capped waves, sailing vessels far at sea
scene.atmosphere: Paranoid watchfulness, exposed position suggesting both power and vulnerability, constant tension

composition.cameraAngle: Side profile emphasizing isolation and vigilance
composition.focus: Captain's weathered profile against sky, telescope extended
composition.depth: Captain on cliff edge foreground, coastal road snaking through middle distance, infinite ocean horizon
